title: Pediatrics and Adolescent Clinics - Harbor-UCLA Medical Center
cleaned_text: Pediatrics and Adolescent Clinics Pediatric and Adolescent Medicine is a medical practice devoted to comprehensive health care for infants, children, teens and adolescents. Pediatric and adolescent medicine doctors are dedicated to learning how to prevent, diagnose, and treat diseases that affect people who are under the age of 21. The pediatric and adolescent medicine clinics are supported by a team of professionals who work hard to keep you and your child or adolescent in good health through preventive care and the management of chronic medical conditions. Services are offered throughout Los Angeles County. Please see below to find a location near you.
